title: Measuring short distances
creator_credit: Educational Services Incorporated and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Starts with the centimetre scale, moves on to microscopic dimensions and then to the dimensions of atoms by means of Erwin Mueller’s field emission microscope. Shows how calibration of instruments can give us accurate knowledge of these small distances.
